title: Linux ftpwho Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the ftpwho command in Linux, learn its options, and analyze its output to monitor FTP server connections and user activities.

meta.title: Linux ftpwho Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the ftpwho command in Linux, learn its options, and analyze its output to monitor FTP server connections and user activities.
meta.keywords: ftpwho, Linux, FTP, network monitoring, user activity, connection tracking

verify.name: Verify ftpwho command output
verify.hint: Make sure the ftpwho command is displaying at least one active FTP connection in the output.

verify.name: Verify ftpwho command options
verify.hint: Make sure the ftpwho command with the -a option is displaying at least one active FTP connection in the output.

verify.name: Verify ftpwho command output analysis
verify.hint: Make sure the ftpwho command output contains the user information for both "labex" and "admin".
